trans-unit.resname: PW12·79 | Gather the Townsfolk | Card Name
PW12·79 | Gather the Townsfolk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens.

trans-unit.resname: PW12·79 | Gather the Townsfolk | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Fateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, create five of those tokens instead.
trans-unit.target: Fateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, create five of those tokens instead.

trans-unit.resname: PW12·79 | Gather the Townsfolk | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In the memories of those they lost lies the strength needed to defend their city.
trans-unit.target: In the memories of those they lost lies the strength needed to defend their city.

trans-unit.resname: PW12·81 | Curse of Thirst | Card Name
PW12·81 | Curse of Thirst | Card Text | Paragraph 1
PW12·81 | Curse of Thirst | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, CARDNAME deals damage to that player equal to the number of Curses attached to them.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, CARDNAME deals damage to that player equal to the number of Curses attached to them.

trans-unit.resname: PW12·81 | Curse of Thirst | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "May you drink until you drown but never be sated."\n—Odila, witch of Morkrut
trans-unit.target: "May you drink until you drown but never be sated."\n—Odila, witch of Morkrut

trans-unit.resname: PW12·82 | Nearheath Stalker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

trans-unit.source: "Do not speak of this to the elders. They look unfavorably upon my indulgences."
trans-unit.target: "Do not speak of this to the elders. They look unfavorably upon my indulgences."
